Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder by Site/Non-Neoplastic Connective and Soft Tissue Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Bone Disorder/Osteochondritis/Osteochondritis Dissecans
Record.BroaderTerm: Non-Neoplastic Connective and Soft Tissue Disorder
Record.Description: A type of osteochondritis in which articular cartilage and associated bone becomes partially or totally detached to form joint loose bodies. Affects mainly the knee, ankle, and elbow joints.
